content: Everybody, please welcome Heather Macbeth to the maintainer team! And don't hesitate to send new PRs in geometry and analysis, she's impatient to start playing with the bors merging robot.
Hi! Yes, let's get more geometry and analysis! Happy to be on board.
And it's time to welcome our newest maintainer @Eric Wieser ! He's already been reviewing quite a bit, now he can provoke bors himself.
